You both work in the same area
You and Trish both currently work in Scottsdale, Arizona

Founded in 1998, I-ology is a technology company that creates Web-based business tools that streamline our clients' operations. We are committed to revolutionizing the way organizations use the Internet to do business. I-ology creates fully functional, customized Web business tools that streamline everything from marketing activities and customer support to internal processes and administration. Services include: Web integration, Web application development, Website design and development, mobile optimization and development, portal development, content management systems, and digital marketing. I-ology's strategies have facilitated growth for clients such as Sonora Quest Laboratories, Phoenix Children's Hospital, 2008 Arizona Super Bowl, Swift Transportation, Helios Education Foundation, Arizona Technology Council, and Special Olympics of Arizona. I-ology has won numerous industry awards and is active in giving back to the community through organizations such as Teen Addiction Anonymous, Special Olympics of Arizona, the American Heart Association and The Phoenix Zoo.You can learn more about I-ology by visiting: www.i-ology.com or by calling (480) 850-2800. I-ology®, The Science of the Internet®

summary: Founded in 1998, I-ology is a technology company that creates Web-based business tools that streamline our clients’ operations. I-ology offers custom Web programming solutions that integrate back-end systems and enrich Web experiences, complimenting client business objectives and maximizing the return on their Web investment. I-ology's line of services include: Web integration, Web application development, Website design and development, mobile optimization and development, portal development, content management systems and digital marketing.A recipient of numerous industry awards and an active community involvement leader, Ms. Bear is an established and well-recognized veteran of the Web industry. Under her guidance, I-ology has experienced exponential revenue growth and has ended every year profitable. I-ology has built an impressive client base and has been recognized multiple times for achievements and distinctions in growth and excellence from industry leaders, publications, and organizations, including being ranked as Arizona's fastest-growing woman-owned business, and being named as one of the 50 fastest-growing technology firms in the state.
